sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input @input="handleInput" v-model="content"/>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    prop: ['value'],
    data () {
      return {
        content: this.value
      }
    },
    methods: {
      handleInput (e) {
        console.log(e)
        this.$emit('input', this.content)
      }
    }
  }
  </script>
